casebody.data:
No. 341,

Misc.

Lurk v. United States. Eugene Gressman for petitioner. Solicitor General Cox, Assistant Attorney General Miller, Robert S. Erdahl and Philip R. Monahan for the United States.

Motion to use the record in No. 669, October Term, 1960, granted. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
